item.title: The Astonishing Adventures Of Finspector Eelliott Fishbone: Eel Detective Part 6: TRAPPED On Planet Big Burger!
item.description:
puzzle platformer jamgame for sewerjam 8 and my first game using the Fennel programming language. i made this with takumatori who did all the art. i didn’t get to finish it :(

the game saves your progress, so if you get stuck, you can hit escape/start and then press the continue button to restart the level. i am aware of at least one point in the game where you can get stuck

controls are arrow keys

item.title: Evil Egg
item.description:
Evil Egg was an ecstatic twin-stick nightmare known for its¬†brutal shooting action and intense audiovisual effects. Infinite horrors tear apart a world of little green men, the only hope an errant hatchling.

The last known¬†Evil Egg arcade¬†cabinet to remain was recovered in Eugene, Oregon, found in a state of extreme disrepair. This digital release is a faithful emulation of the original hardware, made possible by a restoration effort led by a small team of dedicated preservationists. The private collector responsible for the machine’s donation has asked to remain anonymous.

Features:

  • CLASSIC, FULLY ANALOG TWIN-STICK BLASTING
  • UNIQUE ASSORTMENT OF ENEMIES, HAZARDS, POWERUPS AND ARTEFACTS
  • INFINITE LEVELS IF YOU CAN REACH THEM
  • SCORE SYSTEM REWARDING SKILL AND¬†FUN
  • ONLINE LEADERBOARDS
  • LOOKS LIKE CANDY

PHOTOSENSITIVITY WARNING: This game contains flashing lights and intense strobe effects.

item.title: Famulus
item.description:
Famulus is a short, retro-style shoot-em-up-and-down adventure game about kebabs made by me (programming, sounds, graphics) in about 2 weeks for Sewer Jam 5.

can be played with the keyboard or a gamepad. press F11 or Alt+Enter to toggle fullscreen.

this game is pretty derivative but perhaps fun. the primary goal for this project was to ensure that my new game engine (built with L√ñVE) is complete enough to power an actual game, even if it is a small one.

item.title: Carpet Gallery
item.description:
An endless walker with procedural scenery and objects. Please remove footwear upon entry. Made for Toy Jam 1 with fibr/faec doing the music.

  • arrow keys/WASD: move
  • Z/J: interact/confirm
  • X/K: map/cancel
  • C/L: screenshot
  • Esc: menu
  • F11: toggle fullscreen
  • the same world is shared by all players
  • executable saves screenshots to My Pictures
  • web version may have audio problems and other bugs. download for the best experience

item.title: Wings & Rings
item.description:
Wings & Rings is an arcade style game where your objective is to maximize your score by flying through rings, all while surviving endless waves of enemies.

I only wrote the music for this one. the rest was done by chanoc and SquareAnon.

item.title: AnGree Face
item.description:
Cast a spell made from two words. The first word affects your projectile, the second affects your fire pattern. Pick words up off enemies and find them around the arena. Words are lost when you’re hit. If you’re hit with no words, you die. Rack up the kills!

  • WASD: Move.
  • LMB: Shoot.
  • RMB: Swap spell order.
  • E: Pickup word.
  • ESC: Pause.
  • Alt+Enter/F11: Toggle fullscreen.

Made in 48 non-consecutive hours. All visual assets come from The Roguelike by Backterria.

See the project source here.

item.title: Lil' Zuddy
item.description:
LIL’ ZUDDY is a virtual pet akin to Tamagotchi in which you can hatch and raise your very own Zuddy, a tiny bug with a big heart.

LIL’ ZUDDIES come in many shapes and colors. There are over a thousand combinations! Your Zuddy will probably look different from any of your friends’! Depending on how well you train it, your Zuddy will evolve into different kinds of special critters, too. Your Zuddy can share its stats and socialize using our new CHATTERFLY technology, allowing Zuddies from across the world to convene right from the comfort of the nest (Not available in web version!!!).

Tips

  • Your Zuddy will stick around even when you put it away; there’s no pausing, even if you close the game! Make sure you check on your Zuddy often, lest you risk losing it to the harsh realities of Nature.
  • Zuddies have needs. Fun, food, and good health are all important to every Zuddy. Your Zuddy will tell you itself what it needs! Pay attention, because Zuddies are quite fragile, and can only survive a lack of any of these necessities for so long.
  • Zuddies have 3 main stats: Smarts, Strongth, and Training. You can view your Zuddy’s stats in the statsüìã menu. Smarts and Strongth affect your Zuddy’s performance in games, and all three will help determine what Zuddy your larva will transform into.
  • Use the speech üí¨ menu! If your Zuddy cries for attention because it is hungry, or if it eats a food it doesn’t like, don’t forget to praiseüëçit! Be careful though, because some foods will make your Zuddy sick, depending on the diet.
  • Conversely, if your Zuddy cries for attention, but won’t accept food or play, you might need to scold üö´ it. It may feel bad, but discipline makes for a happy, healthy Zuddy! A highly trained Zuddy will also be less likely to cause trouble.
  • Medicine üíâ is great for restoring the health of a sick Zuddy, but use it sparingly! Not only is it very unpleasant, it is also quite hard on the Zuddy physiology, causing sleepiness and reducing the Zuddy’s Strongth.
  • Sometimes your Zuddy will be dormant, whether it is sleeping or in the pupal stage. Don’t fret! Just wait it out. You can always come back later.

LIL’ ZUDDY was made in 16 days for Sewerjam 3.

item.title: Blood Golf 2023
item.description: BLOOD GOLF is a PVP or PVE golf-em-up where your target is the other player. Use powerups, map knowledge, and, most importantly, elegant combat-golf technique to turn your enemies into a fine mist or send them past the stratosphere. Has local multiplayer, or you can fight against the CPU. I made this game with blauxel who drew all the art.

item.title: Meat Machines
item.description: here is a game HIS and i were working on for a while but had to pause indefinitely for various reasons. in this game you build machines made out of meat and use them to attack other machines. gamepads and local co-op are supported. sorry it runs like crap and the tutorial sucks but i think it’s pretty fun otherwise

item.title: Deep
item.description:
DEEP is an endless-driller rogue-lite where the player is multi-tasked with plunging a byzantine drilling machine into the earth, plundering its resources and fending off hordes of horrible creatures.

Made in just under two weeks, including all art, sounds, and music.

Apologies in advance: this game runs like crap. It also crashes for some people. I don’t know why. I’M SORRY!

item.title: Your Only Move Is HUSTLE
item.description: Your Only Move Is HUSTLE is an online, turn-based fighting game and superpowered fight scene simulator. I started working on this game in September 2022 and a few months later it released on Steam and changed my life forever.

item.title: No Reservations
item.description: High-octane fast-paced top down shooter plus “dating” “sim”. Take your girl out for pizza. Made entirely in 8 days by me and HIS for GoedWare Game Jam.

item.title: Super Misfire or: One Gun To Shoot Them All
item.description:
üèÜ #1 for “Fun” in ludum dare 49 compo

Here is my take on the ‚Äúunstable‚Äù theme for Ludum Dare 49. You operate a malfunctioning quantum supergun, which shoots things it probably isn‚Äôt supposed to. Achieve superiority over your friends by travelling further through the Dungeon of Enemies than they can.

Every bullet you can shoot is unique, and all have the capacity to save your life or spell your death in their own ways.

Only available to play in-browser on itch.io. Maybe I’ll put it here later.

item.title: Defy Godwin
item.description:
Defy Godwin is a comedic work of interactive fiction and a realistic forum simulator.

Godwin‚Äôs Law: As a discussion on the Internet goes on, the probability of a comparison to Nazis or Adolf Hitler approaches 1.

Amidst a war of rhetoric, you are but an internet forum moderator - the impartial paramedic of a digital battlefield. With a new corporate leadership buying out your home base @ Hyperlink Heaven, your mission is now to appease advertisers by preventing users from invoking Nazism (and thus Godwin‚Äôs Law). Slap and exile in your vain attempt to stifle their discussions‚Äô inevitable conclusion. Use your wit and read between the lines to end these battles before they even start.

This game was made with personal friends who contributed the majority of the writing and prefer to remain anonymous.

item.title: Leg Frogs
item.description:
A quick little game I made for a jam. You play as a frog. Beat your friends to be the best frog. Email me if you can beat the AI coz I need tips.

Now with gamepad support and various gameplay options.

view the source code here

item.title: Rocket Sword (Demo)
item.description: This is a silly, fast-paced, 2.5D slash-‘em-up game where you are a guy with a big rocket-propelled sword. It was too ambitious so I never finished it, but I credit it with a multitude of lessons learned. You can play with all the content I made for it, but there will probably never be more.

item.title: GRiPPY
item.description:
GRiPPY is a hardcore, subversive platformer for the PICO-8 system about climbing through a mysterious underground complex and overcoming hostile terrain. You play as Grippy, a creature with very, very strong arms, but no legs. You must travel by hurling yourself across the world and latching onto anything you can grip. This was my first PICO-8 game and my first finished game.

Controls

  • O/X (z/x on keyboard): reach out a hand and grab
  • left/right: rotate aim angle
  • down (hold): aiming mode; reach without grabbing
  • up: hop

You can change your control settings in the pause menu.
